CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Compared to the main - chain copolymer of PBDTDPP-OR reported by the Jo group , this side - chain copolymer of PBDT-TDPP-S exhibited a 100 nm blue - shifted maximum absorption peak.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PBDTDPP-OR |
| PBDT-TDPP-S |

In the given paragraph, the two "Material Name" entities are:

1. PBDTDPP-OR
2. PBDT-TDPP-S

These entities represent the names of the copolymers mentioned in the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PBDT-TDPP-S |

In the given paragraph, the "Material Name" entity is:

1. PBDT-TDPP-S

The other mentioned entity, PBDTDPP-OR, is not a material name in the context of the paragraph, as it is not mentioned in the current paragraph. It was mentioned in the previous context. Therefore, I have removed it from the table.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Compared to the main - chain copolymer of PBDTDPP-OR reported by the Jo group , this side - chain copolymer of PBDT-TDPP-S exhibited a 100 nm blue - shifted maximum absorption peak.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 100 nm |
| a 100 nm blue-shifted maximum absorption peak |

Note: I have identified two "Property Value" entities in the paragraph. The first one is "100 nm," which is a numerical value. The second one is "a 100 nm blue-shifted maximum absorption peak," which is a more descriptive value that includes the numerical value "100 nm" as part of its description.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| a 100 nm blue-shifted maximum absorption peak |

Note: I have removed the entity "100 nm" since it does not clearly refer to the value of a material property on its own. Instead, I have included the more descriptive entity "a 100 nm blue-shifted maximum absorption peak" as the valid "Property Value" entity.
